com.itextpdf.text.api

Interface Spaceable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Image, ImgCCITT, ImgJBIG2, ImgRaw, ImgTemplate, ImgWMF, Jpeg, Jpeg2000, ListItem, Paragraph, PdfDiv, PdfPTable

    public interface Spaceable
    Objects implementing Spaceable allow setting spacing before and after.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
